author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: Game Asset Image Embed [Revelar]
description: There doesn't exist an easy way to embed CNFT images + metadata on websites in a simple standard format.
solution: Use the success from OpenSea and other Ethereum NFT marketplaces to create a rich API for NFT collection embeds in a Javascript Widget.
experience: A decade as a Tech Founder & CTO + Plutus Pioneer + Fund 6 + alongside a full team of engineers. (See below)
